page.title: 20EDUCATION IN WALKINGTON.
page.content: THE VILLAGE SCHOOL HOUSES 88 JUNIOR PUPILS,THE 60 INFANTS ARE IN A NEW BUILDING 0.5 miles AWAY WITH THE MAIN HALL AND SPORT FIELD.ALL WILL ONE DAY BE AT THIS SITE TO THE EAST OF OUR AREA.SENIOR PUPILS TRAVEL TO BEVERLEY. THE SCHOOL HAS A HEADMASTER AND FOUR JUNIOR TEACHERS,WITH A PERIPATETIC TEACHER OF READING TO HELP THE SLOWER CHILDREN.SCHOOL STARTS AT 8.55am AND FINISHES AT 3.30pm WITH TWO BREAKS OF 20 MINUTES AND LUNCH FROM 12.00 TO 1.10pm.SCHOOL DINNERS ARE AVAILABLE FROM BEVERLEY AT 60p EACH,MANY PUPILS BRING THEIR OWN PACKED LUNCH. THE CHILDREN ARE OFFERED SPORT AND MUSIC CLUBS OUTSIDE NORMAL TIMETABLES. HEAD,MR M BRAMMER;J4_MRS N DODDS;J3_ MISS A ISTED;J1_MRS J STEWART;J2 MR D KITCHEN WHO ALSO ASSEMBLED THE SURVEY. SCHOOL SECRETARY MRS P WATSON TYPED AND PRINTED THE CENSUS FORMS.THANKS!!
